text: The Capiznon language, (Capiznon: "mga Capize√±o) is a majority language particularly in Capiz province by its surrounding languages of Hiligaynon, Kinaray-a, Aklanon and Cebuano, The language is one of the Visayan languages group in the Visayas state, mixed with Hiligaynon. Category:Languages of the Philippines
title: Capiznon language
